name: NEW IN

name: DINING

name: OCCASIONAL CHAIRS
description: Enjoy flat-fee unlimited furniture delivery, financing and easy online ordering. Add style and fun to your space with rocking, accent and swivel chairs.

name: SOFAS
description: Explore our beautiful, well-crafted collection of sofas with everything from sleek, contemporary recliners to cosy corner sofas and much more.

name: BEDS
description: Our murade assortment ranges from baby cots to box spring beds and everything else you need, such as mattresses, toppers, pillows and spring wood frames.

name: GLASS FURNITURE
description: Stories about glass furniture and its design, such as coloured glass table legs, transparent cabinets and wardrobes, and reflective surfaces.
